name: MTMag - Season Pass
description:
ALL SALES FINAL. Love musicals? Of course, you do! And Musical Theatre Magazine is just the *digital delivery* publication for you. With Broadway stars and Tony Award winner galore, Musical Theatre Magazine highlights amazing performers and creatives on Broadway, around the US, and internationally, too. This is the ANNUAL Subscription for the 2013-2014 season! This covers MTMag issues from October 2013 to July 2014, plus a special extra issue. ALL SALES FINAL. IS THIS A GIFT? Input the recipient's information in the "To:" area, and email me the receiver's name and email address after you place your order: contact@mtmag.co.

FEATURED GUESTS' COMMENTS:

  • Danny Burstein: "This is a truly wonderful new digital magazine. Trish Causey, you have outdone yourself. Long may you run." (on Facebook)
  • Kathleen Marshall: "It's really beautiful and very interesting! I have to say that is one of the most thorough and accurate articles I've ever been interviewed for. And thanks for all those great pictures, too!" (via email)
  • Tony Sheldon: "I'm loving what I'm reading so far!" (via email)
  • Liz Callaway: "The magazine is gorgeous." (on Facebook)

SUBSCRIBERS' COMMENTS:

  • "Congrats to @TrishCausey on the first issue of @MusicalThtreMag... 68 fantastic pages!" ~ Robbie R., NYC, on Twitter
  • "Congrats on the first issue! Lots of great and interesting articles." ~ Eric S., South Africa
  • "Excellent content and such great value! Thanks for all your hard work and can't wait for the next one!" ~ Ian N., Australia
  • "I'm really enjoying the first issue - so many great articles!" ~ Karen J., NY

Since you're ordering after the release of the season premiere, you will get the previous issues delivered to your email separately. For instance, if you order the Season Pass in December, the October and November issues will be emailed to you! A few of the amazing interviews in the first few issues include Tony Award winners Carol Channing, Kathleen Marshall, Bill T. Jones, Des McAnuff, Gregg Barnes, Derek McLane, Kevin Adams, Andy Blankenbuehler, Cady Huffman, Donna McKachnie, to name a few. Tony Award nominees Danny Burstein, Tony Sheldon, Liz Callaway, Ann Hampton Callaway, Bobby Steggert, Xanthe Elbrick, and more! Thanks so much for supporting Musical Theatre Magazine, which focuses on "The Art & Craft of America's Greatest Original Artform." Break a leg!

name: Musical Theatre Magazine - December 2013
description:
ALL SALES FINAL. The December issue of Musical Theatre Magazine is once again filled with Tony Award winners, Broadways favorites, reviews, advice, and fabulous practical info for the musical thespian.

IN THIS ISSUE:

  • Tony Award Winner LAURA BENANTI
  • Tony Award Winner LEVI KREIS
  • Tony Award Winner DONNA McKECHNIE
  • Emmy Award Winner GLEN BERGER on "Song of Spider-Man"
  • Tony Award Nominee BILL RUSSELL on "Side Show"
  • American Idol's MICHAEL ORLAND on"Breaking Down the Lyric"
  • MASTER CLASS - Dr. Kristin Linklater: Freeing the Natural Voice
  • VOICE - Joanna Cazden: Hoarseness at the Holidays
  • REVIEW - Cast Album: How the Grinch Stole Christmas! The Musical
  • BOOKS - Playbill Broadway Yearbook
  • QUOTE OF THE MONTH

Enjoy! trish MTMag.co

name: Musical Theatre Magazine - NOVEMBER 2013
description:
November issue of Musical Theatre Magazine. *Digital Delivery* ALL SALES FINAL. Rock Musicals issue! Best for ages 17+ due to subject matter of rock musicals. Featuring articles with Tony Award winners Andy Blankenbuehler, Kevin Adams, & Joe DiPietro, Tony Award nominees Bobby Steggert & Tony Sheldon, Broadway debut JANIS JOPLIN's Mary Bridget Davies, Master Rock Voice Teacher Melissa Cross, MasterClass with Sheri Sanders on How to Rock the Audition, Review of LIZZE THE MUSICAL, interview with creators of Broadway's Voiceless, and more! Features include Broadway's A NIGHT WITH JANIS JOPLIN, and Australia's KING KONG, to name just a few!

FEATURED GUESTS' COMMENTS:

  • Danny Burstein: "This is a truly wonderful new digital magazine. Trish Causey, you have outdone yourself. Long may you run." (on Facebook)
  • Kathleen Marshall: "It's really beautiful and very interesting! I have to say that is one of the most thorough and accurate articles I've ever been interviewed for. And thanks for all those great pictures, too!" (via email)
  • Tony Sheldon: "I'm loving what I'm reading so far!" (via email)
  • Liz Callaway: "The magazine is gorgeous." (on Facebook)

SUBSCRIBERS' COMMENTS:

name: Musical Theatre Magazine - OCTOBER 2013
description:
PREMIERE ISSUE of Musical Theatre Magazine. *Digital Delivery* ALL SALES FINAL.

FEATURED GUESTS' COMMENTS:

  • "Excellent content and such great value! Thanks for all your hard work and can't wait for the next one!" ~ Ian N., Australia

Featuring articles with Tony Award winners Carol Channing, Kathleen Marshall, Cady Huffman, Gregg Barnes, Derek McLane, and Des McAnuff, plus 4-time Tony Award nominee Danny Burstein, Tony nominee Liz Callaway, Cabaret queen Ann Hampton Callaway, and more. Features include Canada's The Who's TOMMY, Australia's KING KONG, to name just a few!
